name: Rythmatic Diamond
description:
RYTHMATIC DIAMOND

A rythym game based around a diamond shape and arrows. The diamond slowly expands, and to travel, you need to press the arrow key / wasd button in the corresponding direction of the arrow when the diamond has reached its corner. 

The game has four levels which go from very slow to an extreme test of focus and skill.

The music in this game was made using apple's garageband, and the font used in-game is turret road.
